companies.companyName: MEX QUALITY BOX S.A DE C.V.
companies.description: A leading provider of innovative packaging solutions and efficient distribution of packaging products. Specializing in corrugated cardboard packaging with a commitment to punctuality, flexibility, and the highest quality standards. Serving markets in Mexico, EU, USA, and Canada.
companies.address: Av. Vicente Guerrero 145, Agua Blanca Industrial, 45235 Zapopan, Jal., Mexico
companies.aboutUs: We are a Mexican company based in Guadalajara, Jalisco, dedicated to the commercialization of paper and cardboard packaging. Our origin dates back to 1995 when it was established as Cartón y Servicios. We are an organization committed to meeting customer needs in the food market, both nationally and internationally, as well as the industrial sector, through innovation in materials, supplies, and packaging designs that result in improvements for product packaging.

companies.description: A trusted manufacturer and distributor of corrugated packaging solutions in Mexico. Committed to providing high-quality packaging products and services to businesses across various industries.
companies.aboutUs: We are an institutional company of Mexican family origin with 32 years of experience in the development of packaging solutions of the highest quality, socially responsible and ecologically sustainable. At Cyecsa, we are passionate to serve our customers with speed decisions making, special attention to details and excellent delivery service.

companies.companyName: MULTIEMPAQUES DEL NORTE S.A DE C.V.
companies.description: A prominent packaging manufacturer in Northern Mexico, specializing in multi-purpose corrugated packaging solutions for diverse industrial applications.
companies.aboutUs: Multiempaques del Norte S.A. de C.V. is a company with 20 years of experience in the market, with coverage throughout the Mexican Republic. They offer packaging products, packaging and market leading brands nationwide. They hold ISO 9001:2015 certification, ensuring quality management and continuous improvement. They have significant storage capacity and a transport network for timely deliveries. Their philosophy emphasizes commitment and selfless support to internal and external clients, promoting employee growth and teamwork.
companies.address: Av Milimex 321, Parque Industrial Milimex, Apodaca, Nuevo León, México.

companies.companyName: CAJAS E IMPRESIONES COMETA S.A DE C.V.
companies.description: A specialized manufacturer of corrugated boxes and printed packaging solutions, combining quality manufacturing with advanced printing capabilities.
companies.aboutUs: We help you develop the best packaging for the protection of your product, working on the details of image, quality, sustainability and cost reduction. We have an expert team dedicated to design and development, as well as a quality laboratory equipped with advanced technology, to offer you the highest quality packaging.
companies.address: Sauzalito 195 Int.1, Col. San Carlos la Roncha CP. 37544 León, Gto

companies.description: A modern packaging solutions provider serving the agricultural and food industries in Mexico, with a focus on sustainable and innovative packaging designs.
companies.aboutUs: Sultana Packaging is a 100% Mexican company, a leader in packaging solutions since 2008. They design and manufacture corrugated boxes and packaging for national and export industries, with a focus on quality and commitment. Their experience spans key industries such as medical, industrial, technological, automotive, food and beverage, and agricultural. They are ISO 9001:2015 certified, committed to continuous improvement and customer satisfaction. Their vision emphasizes a culture of quality and processes, and a strong work team to guarantee client satisfaction. They are proud of making corrugated boxes and packaging the Mexican way. They offer resilient, durable, and practical solutions with guaranteed quality through their own control laboratory, tailored solutions from their structural and graphic design department, and a commitment to sustainability by working with FSC-certified providers and having a wastewater treatment system. They also offer competitive pricing without compromising quality.
companies.address: Av. Palmera #12341, Parque Industrial El Encanto, Tijuana, B.C., México

companies.description: An established manufacturer of cellulose-based corrugated packaging products in Sonora, with decades of experience in providing reliable packaging solutions.
companies.aboutUs: We are a 100% Mexican company. We work with efficient processes and a committed and competent human team.
companies.address: Not explicitly found on the website, but the company operates in Hermosillo, Sonora, and has offices in Navojoa and Tijuana.

companies.description: A versatile packaging manufacturer serving the footwear and leather goods industries, offering customized corrugated packaging solutions.
companies.aboutUs:
Here's the English translation of the provided Spanish text:

**Quality Policy:**
At Relva, we know that customer satisfaction is the best source of profitability, which is why we work to meet the requirements of our quality management system and continuously improve it.

**Quality Assurance System:**
Given that globalizing trends in the world economy have forced Mexican companies to enter a market of international competition, competitiveness takes on significant importance. Relva has held ISO 9001-2015 certification since 2012, continuously maintaining and improving its processes. Furthermore, it is in the process of certification as a "Clean Company," with the aim of continuing its continuous improvement.

**Mission:**
We are cardboard packaging manufacturers committed to customer satisfaction.

**Vision:**
To be known by our customers as the best option for cardboard packaging.

**Values:**
Responsibility, Teamwork, Honesty, and Respect.

Relva is a company specializing in manufacturing packaging solutions for the industry, in accordance with the requirements of its clients and stakeholders.
companies.address: Potrero 108 Col. Industrial Brisas del Campo - León, Guanajuato, México - C.P. 37297

EMPROPACK is a company where our values, passion for work, and service are reflected in our employees and customers.

companies.companyName: VITTI EMPAQUES S. DE R.L DE C.V.
companies.description: An innovative packaging manufacturer in Puebla, specializing in corrugated packaging solutions for the automotive and manufacturing industries.
companies.aboutUs: We are a 100% Mexican company, dedicated to manufacturing corrugated cardboard packaging and accessories. Our culture fosters continuous improvement, providing consultation on storage and packaging optimization. We also meet market demands by developing new products and designs.

companies.companyName: DURABOX DE CHIHUAHUA S.A DE C.V.
companies.description: A durable packaging solutions provider in Northern Mexico, known for producing high-strength corrugated boxes for heavy-duty industrial applications.
companies.aboutUs: Our primary emphasis is the manufacturing of corrugated packaging and containers. We offer a wide range of fiberboard grades from single wall to triple wall combinations to meet the specific needs of different type of industries. Since 1975 Durabox® has been committed to provide quality products and services. Our organization strives on building strong and long term relationships with our customers by providing them with a vast variety of packaging solutions. Our Mission is to provide products and services in an on time basis and functional manner in order to totally comply with our customer´s packaging needs and requirements. We direct our efforts to create value added solutions. Our Vision is far reaching with five major concepts in mind: To be an industry leader. To meet our customers, suppliers and employee´s desires. To be an innovated, competitve and action-oriented company while ensuring a trouble-free enviroment. To provide our customers with service, quality, innovation, price and continouos improvement. To learn, to grow and expand along with our customers. Quality Policy: To satisfy the packaging needs of our customers, through the continuous improvement of our processes and fulfilling the quality objectives.
companies.address: 340 Alfonso Reyes, Chihuahua Industrial Complex, Chihuahua, Chih, MX. 31136
